c74object.name: fl.atan2~
c74object.digest: For each pair of input values calculates the arctangent using two arguments (left operand is y, right operand is x).
c74object.description:
fl.atan2~calculates pairs of values in turn.
The result is an output frame at least as long as the smaller of the two inputs.
When frames mismatch in size the result depends on the setting of the mismatch parameter.
Either or both inputs may be set to trigger output.

entry.name: 1. /mistmatch [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the mode when dealing with mismatched input lengths:
[0] - wrap: the smaller input is read modulo against the larger input.
[1] - shrink: the output length is set to the size of the smaller input.
[2] - pad_in: the smaller input is padded prior to the calculation to match the larger input.
[3] - pad_out: the output is padded to match the size of the larger input.

entry.name: 2. /trigger_ins [enum]
entry.description:
Sets which inputs trigger output:
[0] - both: both inlets trigger output.
[1] - left: left inlet triggers output.
[2] - right: right inlet triggers output.

entry.name: 3. /pad [double]
entry.description: Sets the value used for padding (for either pad_in or pad_out modes).
